name: Pollo tandoori
desc: A signature chicken dish of Sumeru. The chicken was first marinated with red spices, and then roasted in a tandoor. The process of making this Sumeru classic does not involve any fancy skills, and the use of such a humble clay oven might be surprising to some. In Sumeru, a tandoor to a veteran chef is as important as a trusty sword to an adventurer.

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 272 and CRIT Rate by 8% for 300s.

customize.name: Ricetta: pollo tandoori
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Tandoori Roast Chicken.

customize.name: Pollame
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Funghi di Rukkhashava
customize.desc: Un tipo di fungo che cresce sviluppando strati uno sopra l'altro, come a formare un mare di nuvole, e che cresce principalmente sugli alberi nel profondo della foresta pluviale.

customize.name: Padisarah
customize.desc: Pianta sacra e nobile, le cui condizioni di crescita nel suo ambiente sono molto esigenti. I boccioli dei suoi fiori possono essere lavorati per preparare spezie preziose.

customize.name: Spezie
customize.desc: A seasoning with varied flavors. It is made from dried Harra Fruits and can enrich the taste of a dish. Therefore, Sumeru locals say, "Spice goes well with anything."

customize.name: Pollo tandoori delizioso
customize.desc: A signature chicken dish of Sumeru. The vibrant flames have locked the umami inside the chicken's reddened skin. Once it slips into your mouth, the rich flavor will awaken your every taste bud. The chicken and spices seem to have performed a mysterious Sumeru dance on the tip of your tongue, evoking the image of a festive banquetâ€¦

customize.name: Pollo tandoori sospetto
customize.desc: A signature chicken dish of Sumeru. Baked in high heat, the chicken has become dry and wooden. The overabundance of seasonings has covered the original scent of the ingredients. Even someone who likes jerky will need a bottle of water to help swallow the meat.
